Comments_List: How to form a claim and continue that argument throughout an entire academic essay.

I know how to write a paper in academic way and I read a lot of articles and papers in fields I have never been before, that's good. And by raising questions when reading a piece of news or something, I kind of know what critical thinking is.
I felt that the class discussions were not always that productive to improving my skills as a writer. More discussion of other pieces of literature and/or our own essays would have been helpful.

I like the conversations we made during class. It's very interesting to share everyone's ideas. Besides I think the workshop, which provides a good opportunity for us to read other's paper and make revisons together, is a very good idea.
Yes, Yahel is great and provides clear feedback on assignments and absolutely goes above and beyond to be available to students for meetings before papers are due.
Yes! The instructor of this course is so nice.  And since we only got 5 people to take class together, it's not that stressful and we can discuss freely.
